Articles.Content:
NationStates

This game is FABULOUS.

Anyone else play it? I just started 2 days ago.

Anyone who wants to can join my region, Xerox.

Sorry Zuni, I have to disagree with you as Nation States has noting to offer in the way of gameplay.

Voting on issues for a fictional nation, how is that FUN ??

Your opinion.

Yes, it severely lacks in elements of "gameplay" as you would have in KSP, Minecraft or any 'game' as most people would describe. Voting on issues is not the fun part nor is it all there is. No, most of NS is the roleplay- explore the IC forums for a couple minutes and you'll se what I mean. Also, the regional creation, management, etc is a good thing to deal with, and the system encoded into NS is clever.

Well, I've started my own Empire today: Xeldrakia.

It think it looks like fun - we'll see.
Ewww my population wanted to Eat the rockets because they were overpopulated!

I play nation is Slorch

and yes alot of the game is Rping

Made a nation today, messed up and ended up making a nation called "The People's Republic of Peoples Republic of Cesarland" LOL!

http://dark.nationstates.net/nation=peoples_republic_of_cesarland

I wrote like 2 pages of factbook and my fingers aren't even sore, my mind, on the other hand... (I had to mine deep to find some imagination )

Here's a factbook page I took most of the time and tried to be creative the most.

http://www.nationstates.net/nation=peoples_republic_of_cesarland/detail=factbook/id=195927

Here's what I used to create the maps: http://www-cs-students.stanford.edu/~amitp/game-programming/polygon-map-generation/mapgen2.swf

Edited December 12, 2013 by cesarcurado

Made a nation today, messed up and ended up making a nation called "The People's Republic of Peoples Republic of Cesarland" LOL!

http://dark.nationstates.net/nation=peoples_republic_of_cesarland

I wrote like 2 pages of factbook and my fingers aren't even sore, my mind, on the other hand... (I had to mine deep to find some imagination )

Here's a factbook page I took most of the time and tried to be creative the most.

Here's what I used to create the maps: http://www-cs-students.stanford.edu/~amitp/game-programming/polygon-map-generation/mapgen2.swf

You can rename your nation, in the Settings

Edit: Whoops, sorry. You can only change the other settings

Edited December 12, 2013 by Zuni
Got ya Requiem I was a bit surprised when I recognised your nation's motto off the forums. I'm the Commonwealth of Periphelion.
I hate it when I mispell Space, spaec.
Just moved to Xerox and wrote my first factbook entry. Seems to be a very relaxed game, sufficient to log in only once or twice a day.

I hate it when I mispell Space, spaec.

So YOU were the kerbal spaec empire? \

Pretty funny, if you like role playing.

That's what the game is about (no wonder the creator is a writer lol).

This is a game of words.
speaking of Rps this one is pretty good...
